semantics.label: Behavioural settings.
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Categories Filtering
fields.description: Create one or more filters to be used to filter the cards displayed to the end user. Use the Card Categories entered for the cards above.

field.label: Click to set this filter parameters

fields.label: List of the category/ies to use in this filter
Filter Boolean operator
fields.description: Select the Boolean operator to process the list of filters defined above. The default value is AND. The AND operator will limit the choice to cards that belong to ALL the categories listed in this filter. The OR operator will expand the choice to all cards that belong to at least ONE category. The NOT operator will exclude all cards belonging to any category listed in the filter.

fields.label: Filter by Categories
fields.description: Select how the cards will be filtered. No filtering / First (or unique) filter defined above. / If more than one filter has been defined, enable user to select a filter at runtime.

options.label: Use the FIRST filter defined above

fields.label: Select Mode
fields.description: "Free browsing" is the default mode. Free browsing side by side mode: If you have enabled sub-titles, they will be displayed below the cards. In "Match" mode the user will have to pair the front and the back side of cards. In "Self Correction" mode, they will be able to guess the other side of the cards and confirm if they got it correct or not. "Match with Repetition" is a combination of the "Match" and "Self Correction" modes.

fields.label: Do not use text?
fields.description: Check this box if you only use only images and audio on front and back of cards, no text.

fields.label: Scale the text to fit inside the card
fields.description: Unchecking this option will make the card adapt its size to the size of the text

fields.label: Cards Background color (Front Side)
fields.description: The color of the front side of the cards background. Default is transparent rgba(0, 0, 0, 0).

fields.label: Cards Background color (Back Side)
fields.description: The color of the back side of the cards background. Default is transparent rgba(0, 0, 0, 0). If Default then the Front side colour will be used for both sides.

fields.label: Do not duplicate front images to back of cards
fields.description: Check this option if you do not want front card images duplicated automatically to the back of cards.

fields.label: Cards Order
fields.description: Select the order of cards displayed to the user. If "Random", and the option below is enabled, the user will be able to select the number of cards picked from the cards pool.

fields.label: Select number of cards displayed
fields.description: Allow user to select the number of cards drawn from the pool

fields.label: Display which side first?
fields.description: Select how the cards will be displayed. This option is mostly useful if the front of the cards is not really a question

fields.label: Display which side on the left?
fields.description: Select which side of the cards will be displayed on the left

options.label: Display the front side on the left

fields.label: Penalty percentage
fields.description: Each extra round (in Self-correction or Match with Repetition modes) will cost the user this percentage of the maximum score. Enter 0 for NO penalty. Maximum penalty is 50(%). Do NOT enter the % sign in the box.

fields.label: Pass percentage
fields.description: This setting is the percentage of the total score required for getting result.success in xAPI statements (e.g. in Moodle etc).
